entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
